## Reading long-format T-matrix files

```{r}
d <- read.table('data/tmat_Au20x40_Nmax3.tmat')
names(d) <- c('s','sp','l','lp','m','mp','Tr','Ti')
d <- tmatrix_combinedindex(d)

head(d)
```

## Convert to wide

```{r wide, echo=1}
w <- tmatrix_wide(d)

prettymat(w, coldots=3)
```
